amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to increase authorization of appropriations for the PFAS Infrastructure Grant Prog ram by 25 percent and designates the increase for reimbursing affected community water systems that have previously implemented eligible treatment technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to increase authorization of appropriations for the PFAS Infrastructure Grant Prog ram by 25 percent and designates the increase for reimbursing affected community water systems that have previously implemented eligible treatment technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rice (NY) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Miss Rice (NY).
